title: SAYE - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Mature   Psychological   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Absent Parents   Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Drama   Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Adopted Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Child Abuse   Coming of Age   Delinquents   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Manly Gay Couple   Modern Day   Mute Character   Past Trauma   Reversible Couple
author: Wu Zhe   巫哲
description: When Jiang Cheng was told to return to a family that he never knew or had a relationship with, he had never expected to end up meeting a young girl, and eventually, her seemingly roguish brother Gu Fei, as a first encounter in the new city.>
